internal.content:
--- title: Starter Kits Templates --- ### Overview In the [Overview](/starterkits/overview) section we describe why _Starter Kit Templates_ provide a perfect on ramp to help projects get started. The Developer Tools project is providing a set of seed templates that can be used to get projects moving quickly and focusing on use case business logic. Read up on Why Start Kit Templates and if you have not already tried to deploy your first app get started Starter Kit Templates Overview Deploying your first app Here are links to the base set of **Starter Kit Templates** provided for the _IBM Garage for Cloud Developer Tools_. - To use the Starter Kit templates, click on the link and then the **Template** button to create a version in your own git organization. - Then clone it onto your local machine and then use `igc pipeline` to register it with your Jenkins server. ```bash ibmcloud login | oc login kubectl get pods | oc get pods npm i -g @garage-catalyst/ibm-garage-cloud-cli git clone cd code package.json ! rename your project and push changes igc pipeline -n dev ``` ### Start Kit Templates Links ![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png) ![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png) ![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png)
![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png) ![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png) ![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png)

The Developer Tools project is providing a set of seed templates that can be used to get projects moving quickly and focusing on use case business logic. Read up on Why Start Kit Templates and if you have not already tried to deploy your first app get started Starter Kit Templates Overview Deploying your first app Here are links to the base set of **Starter Kit Templates** provided for the _IBM Garage for Cloud Developer Tools_. - To use the Starter Kit templates, click on the link and then the **Template** button to create a version in your own git organization. - Then clone it onto your local machine and then use `igc pipeline` to register it with your Jenkins server. ```bash ibmcloud login | oc login kubectl get pods | oc get pods npm i -g @garage-catalyst/ibm-garage-cloud-cli git clone cd code package.json ! rename your project and push changes igc pipeline -n dev ``` ### Start Kit Templates Links ![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png) ![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png) ![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png)
